      • getFactoryResourceUrl

        public String getFactoryResourceUrl(Boolean secure,
                           @Nonnull
                           String factoryId,
                           @Nonnull
                           String persistentResourceId,
                           net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceURLGenerator
        Construct a URL for the given factory resource. A factory resource can be created at any time using a persistent ID. A factory using the given factory ID must be registered using the method ResourceManagerImpl.register(ResourceFactory).
        Specified by:
        getFactoryResourceUrl in interface ResourceURLGenerator
        Parameters:
        secure - optional secure parameter when generating fully qualified URLs.
        factoryId - the ID of the factory, as returned by ResourceFactory.getFactoryId().
        persistentResourceId - the persistent resource ID defined by the factory.
        resource - The resource, may be null.
        Returns:
        String The URL.

                           FactoryBasedResource resource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceURLGenerator
        Get a factory resource URL.
        Specified by:
        getFactoryResourceUrl in interface ResourceURLGenerator
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource.
        Returns:
        the URL.
        See Also:

      • getFactoryResourceUrl

        public String getFactoryResourceUrl(@Nonnull
                           String factoryId,
                           @Nonnull
                           String persistentResourceId,
                           net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceURLGenerator
        Construct a URL for the given factory resource. A factory resource can be created at any time using a persistent ID. A factory using the given factory ID must be registered using the method ResourceManagerImpl.register(ResourceFactory).
        Specified by:
        getFactoryResourceUrl in interface ResourceURLGenerator
        Parameters:
        factoryId - the ID of the factory, as returned by ResourceFactory.getFactoryId().
        persistentResourceId - the persistent resource ID defined by the factory.
        resource - The resource, may be null.
        Returns:
        String The URL.

        Description copied from interface: ResourceURLGenerator

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getResourceFromPath

        public net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource getResourceFromPath(@Nonnull
                                                                       String path)
        Get the resource from the path.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getResourceUrl

        public String getResourceUrl(@Nonnull
                    String id,
                    net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceURLGenerator
        Construct a URL for the given resource ID that will be inserted as is into a rendered page. The URL will be escaped as necessary by the rendering engine. The result should be encoded using the HttpServletResponse.encodeURL(java.lang.String) method.
        Specified by:
        getResourceUrl in interface ResourceURLGenerator
        Parameters:
        id - The resource ID as returned by one of the register methods in ResourceManagerImpl.
        resource - The resource, may be null.
        Returns:
        String The URL.
